# Problem 5

```{r, eval=FALSE}
order <- function(x) {
  cost <- x* 8.25
  storage <- 0
  i=0
  while(ceiling((110/x)-i*110/365)>0){
    storage <- storage +(3.75/365)*ceiling((110/x-i*110/365))
    i <- i + 1
    if(i == 10000){
      break
    }
  }
  storage <- storage*x
  cost <- cost + storage
  return(cost)
}

order(1)
order(2)
order(3)
order(5)
order(6)
order(7)
```
